title: Lesson 87
paragraph: Maintenance and terminals require organization and regular attention. Proper proceeding, minimal disruption, and orderly arrangement are essential for smooth operations.

words.example: The receptionist greeted all visitors warmly.

words.meaning: a quality or feature regarded as characteristic
words.example: Patience is an important attribute of a teacher.

words.meaning: able to continue or move forward
words.example: The project is proceedable after approval.

words.meaning: a marine organism or its skeleton; pinkish color
words.example: The reef was full of colorful coral.
Use minimal force to avoid damage.

words.meaning: to direct or guide along a route
words.example: They channelized water into the reservoir.

words.meaning: to put in order or organize
words.example: She arranged the flowers in a vase.

words.meaning: an end point or station; a device for data input/output
words.example: He waited at the airport terminal for his flight.

words.meaning: able to be officially recorded or enrolled
words.example: The company name is registerable online.
